title: Fool That I Am
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Fool that I am
For falling in love with you
And a, fool that I am
For thinking you loved me, too
[Bridge]
You took my heart
Then played the part of, of little coquette
And all my dreams just disappeared
Like the smoke from a cigarette
And oh yeah, yeah
[Verse 2]
Fool that I am
For hoping, oh, you'd understand
And thinking you would listen, too
And, oh, oh, the things, the things I had planned
[Outro]
But we couldn't see eye to eye
So, darling, darling, darling, this is goodbye
But oh, I still care, but I still care
And oh, fool that I am
Oh, oh, but I still care
Fool that I am
